channel.title: Audio Generation on JM Santiago III
channel.description: Recent content in Audio Generation on JM Santiago III

item.title: Affective State Change via Procedurally Generated Haptics
item.description: Explore our latest blog post where we dive into the development of a pioneering industry project combining AI and haptic technology to enhance emotional well-being. We share insights from our journey of creating a web-based prototype that uses personalized audio-haptic experiences to promote relaxation and focus.
